sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tech-stack', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], template: `

System Core

Expertise in the modern stack.

Engineered with a focus on maintainability and performance. I leverage the latest Angular features (Signals, Standalone, SSR) alongside Ionic's powerful cross-platform capabilities.

@for (skill of skills; track skill.name) {
{{ skill.name }}
{{ skill.desc }}
}
A
I
TS
IONIC
`, styles: [` @keyframes spin-reverse { from { transform: rotate(0deg); } to { transform: rotate(-360deg); } } `] }) export class TechStackComponent { skills = [ { name: 'Angular 19+', desc: 'Signals, Standalone, RxJS' }, { name: 'Ionic Framework', desc: 'Cross-platform mobile' }, { name: 'Tailwind CSS', desc: 'Utility-first styling' }, { name: 'Three.js', desc: '3D Web Experiences' } ]; }
